name: py-lightning

variants.name: build_system

description: The deep learning framework to pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models.

dependencies.name: py-arrow
dependencies.description:
Arrow is a Python library that offers a sensible and human-friendly
approach to creating, manipulating, formatting and converting dates,
times and timestamps. It implements and updates the datetime type,
plugging gaps in functionality and providing an intelligent module API
that supports many common creation scenarios. Simply put, it helps you
work with dates and times with fewer imports and a lot less code.

dependencies.name: py-backoff
dependencies.description: Function decoration for backoff and retry.

dependencies.name: py-beautifulsoup4
dependencies.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-croniter
dependencies.description: croniter provides iteration for datetime object with cron like format.

dependencies.name: py-dateutils
dependencies.description: Various utilities for working with date and datetime objects.

dependencies.name: py-deepdiff
dependencies.description: Deep Difference and Search of any Python object/data..

dependencies.name: py-fastapi
dependencies.description:
FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready
for production

dependencies.name: py-fsspec
dependencies.description: A specification for pythonic filesystems.

dependencies.name: py-inquirer
dependencies.description:
Collection of common interactive command line user interfaces, based on
Inquirer.js.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-lightning-cloud
dependencies.description: Lightning AI Command Line Interface.

dependencies.name: py-lightning-utilities

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pydantic
dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.

dependencies.name: py-python-multipart
dependencies.description: A streaming multipart parser for Python

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-rich
dependencies.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-starlette
dependencies.description: The little ASGI library that shines.

dependencies.name: py-starsessions
dependencies.description: Advanced sessions for Starlette and FastAPI frameworks.

Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: py-uvicorn
